Hinde Boujemaa bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bu ọkara Tunisia, ọkara Belgium.

Boujemaa nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ahịa, rụọ ọrụ na ihe ntecha na mmetụta pụrụ iche, ma zụlite ụmụaka tupu ọ malite ọrụ ya nke ime ihe nkiri. N'afọ 2006, ọ gụrụ edemede n'ụlọ akwụkwọ French, na 2009 o dere ihe nkiri, Under Paradise, nke meriri onyinye Sud Ecriture na Carthage Film Festival. O kwuru na ihe kpatara "mgbanwe nke onwe ya" bụ Tunisian Revolution, na-enye ya mkpali ịchụso ime ihe nkiri maka onwe ya.

Ihe ngosi ndekọ Boujemaa bụ "It Was Better Tomorrow" na-agbaso ndụ nke otu nwa agbọghọ nọ na Tunis na-anwa ilekọta ụmụ ya mgbe mgbanwe Tunisian gasịrị. Ihe nkiri ya nke 2019 Noura's Dream gosipụtara nwanyị (nke Hend Sabri gosipụtara) nke nọ n'etiti di ya na onye ọ hụrụ n'anya. Ihe nkiri ahụ gosipụtara na Toronto International Film Festival.
